uk.ac.ucl.nterreri.GUI

Class PatientEditorFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • uk.ac.ucl.nterreri.GUI.PatientEditorFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.HyperlinkListener, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class PatientEditorFrame
extends javax.swing.JDialog
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.HyperlinkListener
    Extends JDialog to set up frame parent-child relationship between originating MainFrame frame and patient editor frame.

    Sets up a JEditorPane to display a hyperlink to the location of the patient condition.

    Is its own Action and Hyperlink Listener to handled user clicking buttons and condition hyperlink.

    Holds simple nested classes (only used for the present class) to allow the user to modify patient pictures by right-clicking on them.

    Also displays patient pictures by resizing them to fit picture panels (WARNING: may become slow while rendering these).

    Author:
    nterreri
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PatientEditorFrame

        public PatientEditorFrame(javax.swing.JFrame parent,
                          Patient patient)
        The constructor relies on the class parent JDialog constructor to establish parent-child relationship between MainFrame instance and any (finite) number of EditorFrame JDialogs. So that if the MainFrame instance is closed, so are all the EditorFrames.

        Parameters:
        parent -
        patient -

      • PatientEditorFrame

        public PatientEditorFrame(javax.swing.JFrame parent,
                          Patient patient,
                          int indexInArrayList)
        The constructor relies on the class parent JDialog constructor to establish parent-child relationship between MainFrame instance and any (finite) number of EditorFrame JDialogs. So that if the MainFrame instance is closed, so are all the EditorFrames.

        Variant receiving an index in Patient.patientRecords from the selected item in a JTable view in MainFrame.

        Parameters:
        parent -
        patient -
        indexInArrayList -

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Creates the frame and registers listeners. Mostly swing-designer generated.

        Used in constructor calls.

        Sets up a hyperlink in the condition JEditorPane.

        Calls refreshPictures() to render pictures.

        See Also:
        refreshPictures()

      • refreshPictures

        private void refreshPictures()
        Calls drawPicture() to scale picture to picture pane. Displays error if failed.
        See Also:
        drawPicture(String, JPanel)

      • fetchComboBoxModel

        javax.swing.DefaultComboBoxModel fetchComboBoxModel()
        Returns:
        the combobox model based on the content of patient.conditionPictures

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Action performed implementation to listen for Toggle Edit Mode button, Save Button and combo box user action.

        The first adds/removes editable flags from text fields and panes, and mouse listeners from the picture panes.

        The second, updates the values in the current patient instance with the data in the text fields and the Strings recording the URIs of the pictures.

        Then updates on-file patient records through Patient class static method.

        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

      • drawPicture

        void drawPicture(java.lang.String source,
                 javax.swing.JPanel component)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Attempts to resize the image from the provided url to properly fit into the picture pane. Must take a JPanel component when creating the frame.

        Parameters:
        source -
        component -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        drawPicture(String, JLabel), http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8333802/displaying-an-image-in-java-swing, http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6714045/how-to-resize-jlabel-imageicon

      • drawPicture

        void drawPicture(java.lang.String source,
                 javax.swing.JLabel component)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Attempts to resize the image from the provided url to properly fit into the picture pane. Uses JLabel directly after the frame has been created to avoid AWT threading issues (see drawPicture(String, JPanel).

        Parameters:
        source -
        component -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        drawPicture(String, JPanel), http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8333802/displaying-an-image-in-java-swing, http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6714045/how-to-resize-jlabel-imageicon

      • hyperlinkUpdate

        public void hyperlinkUpdate(javax.swing.event.HyperlinkEvent e)
        Attempts to open user browser when clicking on hyperlink in JEditorPane. Note: link is only clickable when EditorPane editable flag is set to false (see JEditorPane javadoc), so the link is only clickable when editor mode is toggled off.
        Specified by:
        hyperlinkUpdate in interface javax.swing.event.HyperlinkListener
